title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practice Competencies: TPACK-Based Instructional Design for Interactive Whiteboard Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply the seven knowledge domains of the TPACK framework to actual lesson design.
Learners integrate the five core features of interactive whiteboards (annotations, multi-touch, real-time collaboration, etc.) into language instruction.
Learners can evaluate teaching effectiveness using mixed research methodologies (quantitative + qualitative data analysis).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
